entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
